quoteText: In connection with any reorganization, restructuring, merger or sale, or other transfer of assets, we will transfer information, including personal information, provided that the receiving party agrees to respect your personal information in a manner that is consistent with our Privacy Statement.
title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition

tosdr.case: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
tosdr.tldr: Your information can be transferred to a new company, but only if it complies with Netflix's Privacy Policy.
